title: Damien Martyn wakes up from an induced coma
description: Cricket great Damien Martyn has woken from his coma at Gold Coast University Hospital, where he has been fighting for life after being struck down with meningitis. #DamienMartyn #GoldCoastUniversityHospital #meningitis #cricket

title: Ashes test honours Bondi heroes at SCG | 7NEWS
description: Rain couldn't ruin a special first day of the Fifth Ashes Test at the SCG.  The nearly 50,000-strong crowd, the largest in 50 years, were on their feet to pay tribute to the Bondi terror attack heroes, including Ahmed al-Ahmed. title: Venezuelan president Maduro arrested on drug charges | 7NEWS
description: Venezuelan President NicolÃ¡s Maduro and his wife Celia Flores have been detained in a US facility following their arrest on drug trafficking and weapons charges. The arrest occurred after military operations including explosions in Caracas and a raid on the presidential palace, with the couple now awaiting a court appearance in Manhattan. The action has sparked protests questioning US motives, criticism from Democrats and Venezuelan officials, while US Secretary of State Marco Rubio defends the operation citing drug trafficking concerns and maintains a naval blockade of Venezuelan oil tankers. title: Nationwide protests over US actions in Venezuela | 7NEWS
description: Protests erupted across major Australian cities including Sydney, Melbourne, Perth, Brisbane and Canberra in response to United States actions in Venezuela. Demonstrators at Sydney's Town Hall called on the Albanese government to condemn US involvement. Police intervention was required in Brisbane's King George Square after rival groups clashed during the demonstrations. title: Truck driver dies in fiery M7 crash | 7NEWS
description: A truck driver has died in a fiery crash on the M7 motorway in Cecil Hills, southwest of Sydney. Emergency services responded just after midnight to find the truck had hit a barrier, caught fire and rolled over. All southbound lanes between Elizabeth Drive and Campbelltown Road remain closed, with significant traffic disruptions continuing. title: Man found beaten and burned after 14-hour kidnapping | 7NEWS
description: A 29-year-old man was kidnapped from Military Road in Guildford, Western Sydney, and held captive for 14 hours before being found beaten, stabbed and burned in the boot of a Toyota Camry at Villawood. The victim was discovered by a member of the public who heard his screams and called emergency services. Police are investigating the violent attack, but the victim is not cooperating with authorities and no arrests have been made. title: Venezuelan president spends night in US jail
description: Venezuelan president Nicolas Maduro and his wife Cilia Flores have spent the night in a New York detention centre, awaiting a court appearance on Monday for drug charges after US President Donald Trump ordered his removal. #venezuela #trump #maduro #usa #oil

title: Aussie protesters rally against US actions in Venezuela
description: Protesters have taken to the streets across Australia to march against US actions in Venezuela and to call on the Albanese Government to condemn the United States. #venezuela #usa #trump #protest #rally

title: Truck driver killed in fiery crash in Sydney
description: A driver has been killed after their truck crashed into a barrier, rolled and caught fire in Cecils Hills early on Monday morning. #crash #truckcrash #fire #blaze #sydney

title: China creates theme park made of ice
description: The 27th annual Harbin Ice and Snow World has opened in China, using 400,000 cubic metres of ice and snow and spanning 1.2 million square metres. #harbin #ice #snow #china #themepark

title: Man kidnapped and assaulting at Villawood in Sydney's west
description: A man is recovering in hospital after being kidnapped at Villawood in Sydney's west. The 29-year-old man has been treated for stab, burn and assault injuries to his legs and head. #villawood #westernsydney #sydney #sydneycrime #nswpolice

title: Heatwave to hit Australia's east coast this week
description: Australia's east coast is set to swelter this week as a heatwave sends temperatures above 40C. #heatwave #weather #hotweather #heat #australia

title: Contracts signed to build Sydney Metro West link
description: The critical Sydney Metro West link between the CBD and Parramatta is one step closer after the signing of four contracts to build the connection. #sydney #metro #sydneymetro #construction #transport
